createNameRegistry

  • createNameRegistry(connection: Connection, name: string, space: number, payerKey: PublicKey, nameOwner: PublicKey, lamports?: number, nameClass?: PublicKey, parentName?: PublicKey): Promise<TransactionInstruction>
    • Defined in src/bindings.ts:44

    Creates a name account with the given rent budget, allocated space, owner and class.

    Parameters

    • connection: Connection

      The solana connection object to the RPC node

    • name: string

      The name of the new account

    • space: number

      The space in bytes allocated to the account

    • payerKey: PublicKey

      The allocation cost payer

    • nameOwner: PublicKey

      The pubkey to be set as owner of the new name account

    • Optional lamports: number

      The budget to be set for the name account. If not specified, it'll be the minimum for rent exemption

    • Optional nameClass: PublicKey

      The class of this new name

    • Optional parentName: PublicKey

      The parent name of the new name. If specified its owner needs to sign

    Returns Promise<TransactionInstruction>

  • deleteNameRegistry(connection: Connection, name: string, refundTargetKey: PublicKey, nameClass?: PublicKey, nameParent?: PublicKey): Promise<TransactionInstruction>
    • Defined in src/bindings.ts:189

    Delete the name account and transfer the rent to the target.

    Parameters

    • connection: Connection

      The solana connection object to the RPC node

    • name: string

      The name of the name account

    • refundTargetKey: PublicKey

      The refund destination address

    • Optional nameClass: PublicKey

      The class of this name, if it exsists

    • Optional nameParent: PublicKey

updateNameRegistryData

  • updateNameRegistryData(connection: Connection, name: string, offset: number, input_data: Buffer, nameClass?: PublicKey, nameParent?: PublicKey): Promise<TransactionInstruction>
    • Defined in src/bindings.ts:98

    Overwrite the data of the given name registry.

    Parameters

    • connection: Connection

      The solana connection object to the RPC node

    • name: string

      The name of the name registry to update

    • offset: number

      The offset to which the data should be written into the registry

    • input_data: Buffer

      The data to be written

    • Optional nameClass: PublicKey

      The class of this name, if it exsists

    • Optional nameParent: PublicKey

      The parent name of this name, if it exists

    Returns Promise<TransactionInstruction>
